name: What a Catch
description:
HOW TO PLAY ;-)

"WASD" - move Patrick (the player!)

HOLD "S" - Open doors & change outfits when Patrick is in front of the mirror!

"Z" or "Space" - Switch between Patrol Mode & Free Mode for Pete (the bird). 

(Patrol Mode sets the bird on a horizontal path above the ship & Free Mode allows the bird to be controlled by a player)

Arrow Keys - move Pete (the bird!) Thanks for playing What a Catch!

- - - - - - - - - - -- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

In case you missed it, this is a Fall Out Boy fan game. Still, I think you’ll have fun even if you don’t know the band’s music… Maybe, haha. :p

For context, this year, I’m focusing on my mental health and therapy. Fall Out Boy’s discography has been the soundtrack to these weird, sad, joyful days.  I’m super grateful for their songs & I made this small game to say thanks.

The band's music has ALWAYS resonated with me during the weirdest, hardest times. That’s as true in 2023 as it was in 2015 or 2005. Obviously, I love the new album. It’s a real accomplishment that the music feels SO PERSONAL to me & I’m SO happy it exists!

Lastly, I should mention I do not intend to profit from this game. I just love making games & art & I wanted to make something special for myself and the fandom... and maybe... the band? I dunno lol.

Thanks for playing! <3

Jamie Ashlynn Barker (she/they)

fakegamercomics@gmail.com <-- email me

NOTE: The game is not available on mobile currently.
